effect.shortEffect: Strengthens recoil moves to 1.2× their power.
effect.full: This Pokémon's recoil moves and crash moves have 1.2× their base power. struggle is unaffected. The "crash moves" are the moves that damage the user upon missing: jump kick and high jump kick.

description.diamond-pearl: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
